casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy RICHARDSON. No. 232A95-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2006. Howard A. Kurtz, Raleigh, for Richardson. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to file Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

*548"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Richardson) shall have up to and including the 28th day of December 2006 to file and serve his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of November 2006."
